languages.text: "Ну-ну, зачем так нервничать? Просто надоело, что ты вечно шатаешься со своей свитой. Никакого шанса для теплой беседы с глазу на глаз! Но вижу, твой грозный страж и здесь успел", {n} — кивнув на арбитра, едко усмехается скоморох.{/n} "И да, прошу прощения за... недостаточно мягкий прием. Эти старые механизмы, изъеденные дождями, вечно меня расстраивают. То скрипят, то это..."

"Now, now, why so tense? I simply grew tired of you forever wandering about with your retinue. Never a chance for a quiet word face-to-face. Yet I see your fearsome guardian has managed to find his way here as well." {n}The fool sneers as he nods toward the Arbitrator.{/n} "And do pardon the… less than gentle reception. These rain-worn mechanisms never fail to disappoint — creaking one moment, failing the next."
languages.original_text: "Ну-ну, зачем так нервничать? Просто надоело, что ты вечно шатаешься со своей свитой. Никакого шанса для теплой беседы с глазу на глаз! Но вижу, твой грозный страж и здесь успел", {n} — кивнув на арбитра, едко усмехается скоморох.{/n} "И да, прошу прощения за... недостаточно мягкий прием. Эти старые механизмы, изъеденные дождями, вечно меня расстраивают. То скрипят, то это..."

traits.locale_text: "Now, now, why so tense? only grew weary of you forever wandering about with your retinue. Never a chance for a quiet word face-to-face. Though I see your fearsome guardian has managed to intrude here as well." {n}The jester smirks acidly, nodding at the Arbitrator.{/n} "And do pardon the… less than gentle reception. These rain-worn mechanisms never fail to disappoint — creaking one moment, failing the next."

"Now, now, why so tense? only grew weary of you forever wandering about with your retinue. Never a chance for a quiet word face-to-face. Though I see your fearsome guardian has managed to intrude here as well." {n}The jester smirks acidly, nodding at the Arbitrator.{/n} "And do pardon the… less than gentle reception. These rain-worn mechanisms never fail to disappoint — creaking one moment, failing the next."

"Now, now, why so tense? I simply grew tired of you forever wandering about with your retinue. Never a chance for a quiet word face-to-face. Yet I see your fearsome guardian has managed to find his way here as well." {n}The fool sneers as he nods toward the Arbitrator.{/n} "And do pardon the… less than gentle reception. These rain-worn mechanisms never fail to disappoint — creaking one moment, failing the next."

"Now, now, why so tense? I simply grew tired of you forever wandering about with your retinue. Never a chance for a quiet word face-to-face. Yet I see your fearsome guardian has managed to find his way here as well." {n}The fool sneers as he nods toward the Arbitrator.{/n} "And do pardon the… less than gentle reception. These rain-worn mechanisms never fail to disappoint — creaking one moment, failing the next."

languages.text: 「まあまあ、そんなに構えるな。いつも取り巻きを引き連れてうろつくのには、さすがに飽きた。落ち着いて差しで話す機会なんて、なかったからな。…それにしても、あの物騒な護衛まで、どうにかここまで来たか。」{n}そいつはArbitratorの方へ顎をしゃくり、鼻で笑う。{/n}「それと、この…手荒い出迎えは、まあ大目に見ろ。雨にやられた仕掛けは、ほんと期待どおりにガッカリさせてくれる。さっきはきしんでいたと思えば、次の瞬間には止まる」
languages.original_text: "Now, now, why so tense? I simply grew tired of you forever wandering about with your retinue. Never a chance for a quiet word face-to-face. Yet I see your fearsome guardian has managed to find his way here as well." {n}The fool sneers as he nods toward the Arbitrator.{/n} "And do pardon the… less than gentle reception. These rain-worn mechanisms never fail to disappoint — creaking one moment, failing the next."

traits.locale_text: 「まあまあ、そんなに構えるな。いつも取り巻きを引き連れてうろつくのには、さすがに飽きた。落ち着いて差しで話す機会なんて、なかったからな。…それにしても、あの物騒な護衛まで、どうにかここまで来たか。」{n}そいつはArbitratorの方へ顎をしゃくり、鼻で笑う。{/n}「それと、この…手荒い出迎えは、まあ大目に見ろ。雨にやられた仕掛けは、ほんと期待どおりにガッカリさせてくれる。さっきはきしんでいたと思えば、次の瞬間には止まる。」

languages.text: «Oh, vamos, ¿a qué viene tanta aprensión? Sencillamente me he cansado de que se pasee por ahí siempre con su séquito. No veía ocasión para una charla discreta cara a cara. Y aun así, de alguna manera su temible guardián no se ha separado de su lado». {n}El bufón esboza una siniestra sonrisa y señala al Arbitrator con un gesto de la cabeza.{/n} «Le pido disculpas por una recepción tan poco... decorosa. Estos mecanismos corroídos por la lluvia no son de fiar: tan pronto chirrían como dejan de funcionar».
languages.original_text: "Now, now, why so tense? I simply grew tired of you forever wandering about with your retinue. Never a chance for a quiet word face-to-face. Yet I see your fearsome guardian has managed to find his way here as well." {n}The fool sneers as he nods toward the Arbitrator.{/n} "And do pardon the… less than gentle reception. These rain-worn mechanisms never fail to disappoint — creaking one moment, failing the next."

traits.locale_text: «Oh, vamos, ¿a qué viene tanta aprensión? Sencillamente me he cansado de que se pasee por ahí siempre con su séquito. No veía ocasión para una charla discreta cara a cara. Y aun así, de alguna manera su temible guardián no se ha separado de su lado». {n}El bufón esboza una siniestra sonrisa y señala al Arbitrator con un gesto de la cabeza.{/n} «Le pido disculpas por una recepción tan poco... decorosa. Estos mecanismos corroídos por la lluvia no son de fiar: tan pronto chirrían como dejan de funcionar».

languages.text: “嘿，嘿，这么紧张干嘛？我只是受够了你一直带着随从到处晃荡，根本没机会和你面对面坐下来，安安静静聊上几句。不过看得出来，你那位吓人的护卫也想办法找上门来了。”{n}小丑朝索罗蒙点了点头，嗤笑起来。{/n}“另外，请原谅这场……不太温和的邀请。这些机械装置天天风吹雨淋，总是让人失望，可能前一刻还在咯吱作响，下一刻就出故障了。”
languages.original_text: "Now, now, why so tense? I simply grew tired of you forever wandering about with your retinue. Never a chance for a quiet word face-to-face. Yet I see your fearsome guardian has managed to find his way here as well." {n}The fool sneers as he nods toward the Arbitrator.{/n} "And do pardon the… less than gentle reception. These rain-worn mechanisms never fail to disappoint — creaking one moment, failing the next."

traits.locale_text: “嘿，嘿，这么紧张干嘛？我只是受够了你一直带着随从到处晃荡，根本没机会和你面对面坐下来，安安静静聊上几句。不过看得出来，你那位吓人的护卫也想办法找上门来了。”{n}小丑朝索罗蒙点了点头，嗤笑起来。{/n}“另外，请原谅这场……不太温和的邀请。这些机械装置天天风吹雨淋，总是让人失望，可能前一刻还在咯吱作响，下一刻就出故障了。”

languages.text: "Hey, hey, warum so nervös? Ich war es einfach leid, dass Euch Euer Gefolge ständig begleitet. Ich konnte nie unter vier Augen mit Euch sprechen. Aber wie ich sehe, ist Euer furchterregender Leibwächter auch hier." {n}Der Narr nickt dem Arbitrator grinsend zu.{/n} "Und bitte verzeiht den … unfreundlichen Empfang. Diese vom Regen gebeutelten Mechanismen sind ein Quell der Enttäuschung ... mal funktionieren sie, dann wieder nicht."
languages.original_text: "Now, now, why so tense? I simply grew tired of you forever wandering about with your retinue. Never a chance for a quiet word face-to-face. Yet I see your fearsome guardian has managed to find his way here as well." {n}The fool sneers as he nods toward the Arbitrator.{/n} "And do pardon the… less than gentle reception. These rain-worn mechanisms never fail to disappoint — creaking one moment, failing the next."

Aber wie ich sehe, ist Euer furchterregender Leibwächter auch hier." {n}Der Narr nickt dem Arbitrator grinsend zu.{/n} "Und bitte verzeiht den … unfreundlichen Empfang. Diese vom Regen gebeutelten Mechanismen sind ein Quell der Enttäuschung ... mal funktionieren sie, dann wieder nicht."

languages.text: « Allons, détendez-vous. Je me suis simplement lassé de vous voir constamment {mf|entouré|entourée} de votre petit cortège, sans la moindre chance de pouvoir nous entretenir en tête à tête. Pourtant, je remarque que votre redoutable gardien se trouve également dans l'assistance. » {n}L'imbécile ricane tout en adressant un signe de tête à l'arbitrator.{/n} « Et pardonnez-moi cet accueil… peu chaleureux. Ces mécanismes battus par les intempéries sont une source constante de déception ; soit ils grincent, soit ils ne font pas ce qu'on attend d'eux. »
languages.original_text: "Now, now, why so tense? I simply grew tired of you forever wandering about with your retinue. Never a chance for a quiet word face-to-face. Yet I see your fearsome guardian has managed to find his way here as well." {n}The fool sneers as he nods toward the Arbitrator.{/n} "And do pardon the… less than gentle reception. These rain-worn mechanisms never fail to disappoint — creaking one moment, failing the next."

traits.locale_text: « Allons, détendez-vous. Je me suis simplement lassé de vous voir constamment {mf|entouré|entourée} de votre petit cortège, sans la moindre chance de pouvoir nous entretenir en tête à tête. Pourtant, je remarque que votre redoutable gardien se trouve également dans l'assistance. » {n}L'imbécile ricane tout en adressant un signe de tête à l'arbitrator.{/n} « Et pardonnez-moi cet accueil… peu chaleureux. Ces mécanismes battus par les intempéries sont une source constante de déception ; soit ils grincent, soit ils ne font pas ce qu'on attend d'eux. »

languages.text: "Sakin ol. Neden bu kadar gerginsin? Maiyetinle sürekli etrafta dolaşmandan sıkıldım. Baş başa, sessizce iki kelam etmeye hiç fırsat olmuyor. Yine de görüyorum ki korkunç muhafızın, buraya gelmeyi de başarmış." {n}Soytarı, Yargıcı'ya doğru başını sallarken alaycı bir şekilde sırıtıyor.{/n} "Bir de... Pek nazik olmayan karşılama için affına sığınıyorum. Bu yağmurdan yıpranmış mekanizmalar, hayal kırıklığına uğratmaktan asla geri kalmaz... Bir an gıcırdarlar, sonra bozulurlar."
languages.original_text: "Now, now, why so tense? I simply grew tired of you forever wandering about with your retinue. Never a chance for a quiet word face-to-face. Yet I see your fearsome guardian has managed to find his way here as well." {n}The fool sneers as he nods toward the Arbitrator.{/n} "And do pardon the… less than gentle reception. These rain-worn mechanisms never fail to disappoint — creaking one moment, failing the next."

Yine de görüyorum ki korkunç muhafızın, buraya gelmeyi de başarmış." {n}Soytarı, Yargıcı'ya doğru başını sallarken alaycı bir şekilde sırıtıyor.{/n} "Bir de... Pek nazik olmayan karşılama için affına sığınıyorum. Bu yağmurdan yıpranmış mekanizmalar, hayal kırıklığına uğratmaktan asla geri kalmaz... Bir an gıcırdarlar, sonra bozulurlar."
